alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:17AM EDT until July 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EDT FOR OTTAWA...NORTHWESTERN SENECA...SANDUSKY...SOUTHEASTERN WOOD AND NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 416 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Woodville to near Fostoria, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Findlay, Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, Bloomville, Arcadia, Van Buren, Ballville, Pemberville, Luckey, Bradner, Wayne, Bloomdale and Bettsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
